Articles.Content:
Hi There

Just a quick thread to say hi, I'm Red, or RedentSC, or whatever. 26 year old form the UK who has recently lost all his social life to this one game

Not only that! but i have recruited several guys from my work place. All we do at work now is chat about the different missions we have on the go and sharing .craft files. Our boss is not too impressed but never fear! i will convert him soon enough

Oh and one other thing, this seems to be an epic community. For a game that isn't even complete yet i'm so very impressed and looking forward to sharing my missions with you all. Infact. I posted a few days ago in the ship exchange. Have a look

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35118-Voyager-3-My-First-Interplanetary-Space-Craft?highlight=Voyager

Thanks... now.. back to planning my missions to Eve!
